document_data.name: ''A Throne O'erthrown''
document_data.author: [[Mandarjack]] the [[Minstrel]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''A Throne O'erthrown''''' was a stage play penned by [[Mandarjack]] the [[Minstrel]] in the beginning of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|I've had my share of bright moments, mind ye!
Bedding a princess on [[dragon]]back, by moonlight,
Dancing with [[elves]] in the blue mists of a great [[spell]],
And once, kneeling before a [[goddess]].|Old Lokhlabur in Act I, Scene IV}}
document_data.History: ''A Throne O'erthrown'' featured a character named Old Lokhlabur. The play was first performed in the {{YearlinkName|1403}}.
